file_content.text: Darth Decimus is defeated, General. Tell your men the Legislature is ours.
No need to. Broadcast comm just sang it across Corellia.
It's up to our reserves to push the Empire out completely, but we're already seeing major retreats. Corellia is free.
We're getting ready to declare a formal victory to the Senate. Head for the Press Room when you're ready.
[This broadcast comm cannot be accessed at this time.]
